item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Shortcodes for management of google maps Superb comes with a handful of google maps shortcodes, that were designed to make the use of google maps in your pages and posts as easy as possible, without the need of working with the google maps api itself. The basic structure of google map shortcode is following:
[code] [gmap] [/code] Supported parameters [list type=bullet2] lat:the latitude of your location, e.g 51.507222 lng:the longitude of your location, e.g -0.1275 zoom:the level of default zoom, e.g 13 type:the type of your map, roadmap, satellite, hybrid or terrain width:the width of your map ( in pixels or % total width), default is 100% height:the height of your map ( in pixels or % total height), default is 300px marker:shows an marker at your location, value can be true or false wheel:Enables/disables mousewheel zooming, value can be true or false scale_control:Enables/disables the default scale control, value can be true or false map_type_control:Enables/disables the default map type control, value can be true or false navigation_control:Enables/disables the default navigation control, value can be true or false street_view_control:Enables/disables the default street view control, value can be true or false [/list] Examples of google maps created with shortcodes [gmap type=ROADMAP lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Hi there. [/gmap] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=ROADMAP lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Hi there. [/gmap] [/code] [/toggle]
[gmap type=satellite lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Example of description. Neat, right? :) [/gmap] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=satellite lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=5] Example of description. Neat, right? :) [/gmap] [/code] [/toggle] [gmap type=HYBRID lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=8 map_type_control=false] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=HYBRID lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=8 map_type_control=false] [/code] [/toggle] [gmap type=TERRAIN] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=TERRAIN] [/code] [/toggle]

item.content:encoded:
[tour layout="full"]
[tour_page title="Tours Shortcodes"] Create cool tours like this one in minutes! Now you can create cool Take the tour elements in no time. All you need to do is use the built in tour funcionality, which lets you insert tour to the page of your choice via shortcode. Your tour can be edited in the dialog box, so you basically dont have to touch the code once! Like everything in this theme, this functionality was designed with the pleasure of the end user in mind.Combine this with many shortcodes, advanced portfolio, Ad management and many other features and you get acomplete ready-made solution for your next wordpress project.
[/tour_page]
[tour_page title="Many useful features"] Function for just about anything Just a few picks: [list type=check1] Plugins for slider, contact form, ads, shortcodes, pricing table 80+ shortcodes Unlimited color options Advanced portfolio Pricing table [/list] [/tour_page]
[tour_page title="Bundle!"] Save &100 with Superb! Plugins included with this theme:
uBillboard slider plugin (more than 400 sales on codecanyon.net) uPricing Pricing table plugin (more than 100 sales on codecanyon.net) uAd Advertising plugin uContact Contact form plugin uShortcodes Advanced shortcodes plugin.
Please note that these plugins can be used only with this theme, if you wish to use theme for other projects please purchase the regular licensehere. [/tour_page]
[tour_page title="Purchase Superb today!"]
Do not hesitate and purchase Superb today! If you like what you see, go on and purchase it :) It offers a really great price / value ration, great design and a lot of great features. You can purchase your copy here.
;Also, check out our themeforest and codecanyon portfolio !
[/tour_page]
[/tour]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Shortcodes for management of google maps Superb comes with a handful of google maps shortcodes, that were designed to make the use of google maps in your pages and posts as easy as possible, without the need of working with the google maps api itself. The basic structure of google map shortcode is following:
[code] [gmap] [/code] Supported parameters [list type=bullet2] lat:the latitude of your location, e.g 51.507222 lng:the longitude of your location, e.g -0.1275 zoom:the level of default zoom, e.g 13 type:the type of your map, roadmap, satellite, hybrid or terrain width:the width of your map ( in pixels or % total width), default is 100% height:the height of your map ( in pixels or % total height), default is 300px marker:shows an marker at your location, value can be true or false wheel:Enables/disables mousewheel zooming, value can be true or false scale_control:Enables/disables the default scale control, value can be true or false map_type_control:Enables/disables the default map type control, value can be true or false navigation_control:Enables/disables the default navigation control, value can be true or false street_view_control:Enables/disables the default street view control, value can be true or false [/list] Examples of google maps created with shortcodes [gmap type=ROADMAP lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Hi there. [/gmap] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=ROADMAP lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Hi there. [/gmap] [/code] [/toggle]
[gmap type=satellite lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Example of description. Neat, right? :) [/gmap] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=satellite lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=5] Example of description. Neat, right? :) [/gmap] [/code] [/toggle] [gmap type=HYBRID lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=8 map_type_control=false] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=HYBRID lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=8 map_type_control=false] [/code] [/toggle] [gmap type=TERRAIN] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=TERRAIN] [/code] [/toggle]

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tour layout="full"] [tour_page title="Unlimited color options"] [two-fifths]

Unlimited color options

It is really easy to personalize superb to your needs. Selecting the main color is a question of minute or two. Now it is perfectly possible to have a unique featured-filled website for just a couple of dollars! [br] [br] With Superb, you get the possibility to choose from unlimited number of color options. Well actually that is not entirely true. They are limited to 16 000 000. Go on and try them all! It is fun! [br] [br] As you can see, Superb is versatile wordpress theme that can be used for just about anything. [/two-fifths] [three-fifths][/three-fifths] [/tour_page] [tour_page title="5 plugins included"] [third][/third] [two-thirds]

5 custom plugins worth $100 included

  • uBillboard - Second most popular wp plugin at codecanyon (more than 450 sales!) - $20
  • uPricing - Professional pricing table solution for wordpress - $15

Create cool tours like this one in minutes!
Now you can create cool "Take the tour" elements in no time. All you need to do is use the built in tour funcionality, which lets you insert tour to the page of your choice via shortcode. Your tour can be edited in the dialog box, so you basically don't have to touch the code once! [/half] [half]Like everything in this theme, this functionality was designed with the pleasure of the end user in mind.Combine this with many shortcodes, advanced portfolio, Ad management and many other features and you get acomplete ready-made solution for your next wordpress project. Tons of shortcodes with UI manager

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[two-fifths]

Unlimited color options

It is really easy to personalize superb to your needs. Selecting the main color is a question of minute or two. Now it is perfectly possible to have a unique featured-filled website for just a couple of dollars! [br] [br] With Superb, you get the possibility to choose from unlimited number of color options. Well actually that is not entirely true. They are limited to 16 000 000. Go on and try them all! It is fun! [/two-fifths] [three-fifths] [/three-fifths] [third] [/third] [two-thirds]

5 custom plugins worth $100 included

Superb comes with 5 professional built in plugins, designed and developed by us. These plugins include: [list type="check1"]
  • uBillboard - Second most popular wp plugin at codecanyon (more than 450 sales!) - $20
  • uPricing - Professional pricing table solution for Wordpress - $15
  • uAd - Ad management system - $20
  • uShortcodes - plugins that includes many shortcodes with great UI manager and TinyMCE buttons in visual mode.
  • uContact - Contact form plugin
[/list] [/two-thirds] [br] [br] [half]

Tons of shortcodes with visual UI manager

Superb is super easy to use. To ease your life even more, we prepared a huge set of many shortcodes that will let you insert practically anything into your content. We have shortcodes for just about everything, Google Maps, Google Charts, blog posts, typography, layouts, tours etc. [br] [br] Oh and the best part, we also prepared a set of buttons that appear directly in page / post edit screen - so you don't have to insert shortcodes manually. Majority of shortcodes also supports advanced parameters that can be set without touching the code in UI manager that appears upon clicking. This is literally as easy as it gets. [/half] [half] [/half] [br] [br] [clear] [divider] [half]

Advanced Portfolio

We know how important it is for your to show your work in stylish and modern way. That is why we built an advanced portfolio system. It offers dynamic category sorting and it can also display your work in 4 different layouts - gallery, 1 column, 2 column and 3 column. Adding and editing portfolio entries is really easy - as easy as editing and adding simple Wordpress post.[/half] [half]

"Take the tour" functionality

With our take the tour functionality, you can create amazing tours in matter of minutes. It is just like editing any other page, all you need to do is press a few buttons and add simple shortcode structure to it. Showcasing your products has never been easier. To see an example of this future in action, please head to our "take the tour" page. Everything you'll see over there can be achieved in matter of minutes. All you need is Superb.[/half] [divider] [half]

Maintenance mode with countdown

Another great feature of Superb is it's ability to switch to maintenance mode. All you need to do to active it is press button in admin section. You can also set up the countdown, that will let your visitors know how long do they need to wait. Everything shown on this page can be set up in the admin section, including the option for twitter follow button.[/half] [half]

Pixel perfect design

Both front and backend have been designed with great attention to detail in mind. This way, we managed to deliver a professional solution that has many great futures but also looks very clean, sharp and modern [/half] [divider]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Similarly to uBillboard and uPricing, uAd has been primarily developed for internal use in our themes, but has become a separate plugin since. You can get uAd as a separate plugin here for a mere $20. With Superb, however you get it for free, plus you dont have to worry about integrating it with your own theme.
Features: [list type="star4"]
Fully integrated advertisement solution Supports all standard banner sizes Supports click counting Supports maximum clicks per banner Supports date restriction Allows you to prioritize banners Integrates with Widgets and Shortcodes into sidebars and content Supported Ad Resolutions
[/list]
For more information and for a screencast please visit our uAd page.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
uPricing is an integral part of Superb. It has been originally developed as a part of Superb, and then weve released it as a separate plugin, similarly to uBillboard. You can get it here as a separate plugin for just $15 and use it with your own theme, or you can get it with this theme completely free! [br] Description
uPricing is the ultimate and unique solution for all your wordpress related pricing page needs. Creating pricing tables has never been easier! uPricing comes with easy to use jQuery powered admin interface that lets you create and edit your pricing tables (yes, tables, you can have as many as you wish) without having to touch the code once! You also have the ability to select the featured column, that will be highlited in a very stylish way. All of this working in all major browsers. Oh, and did I mention that it comes with five different skins ? It does. And many more schemes will be released in future updates.
Features
[list type="star4"]
Great Drag&Drop Admin interface Multiple Color Option Easy to use and embed into your themes Supports all Major Browsers Great documentation Built by a team with years of experience with WordPress
[/list]
You can see a demo within Superb here or on the original uPricing page

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
uBillboard is a plugin, that we had originally developed for use in our themes, then weve created a Wordpress Plugin from it, but we are continuing to include it with our themes, only now, it is much better. Also, if you for whatever reason decide that you dont want to buy this theme, you can purchase uBillboard here and use it with you current theme very easily. Main Features [list type="star4"]
Sleek slider front end and admin 18 transition effects + Random Transition effects based on scaling, square and column animation, fading, etc. Paginator, that lets you easily switch among slides Loader that displays real loading progress Customizable resolution Automatic image scaling Great looking and easy to use admin interface Per-slide options like showing time, description layout, transition effect and more Support for HTML markup in descriptions Extensible, add your own filters to the billboard Support for multiple billboards (1 billboard per page)
[/list]
And you get all of this ($20 value) for free, when you purchase this theme!
You can go visit uBillboard website for more information and, a demo and a screencast (The demo is also on the Home page here).

item.title: Google maps
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Shortcodes for management of google maps

Superb comes with a handful of google maps shortcodes, that were designed to make the use of google maps in your pages and posts as easy as possible, without the need of working with the google maps api itself. The basic structure of google map shortcode is following: [code] [gmap] [/code]

Supported parameters

[list type=bullet2]
  • lat:the latitude of your location, e.g 51.507222
  • lng:the longitude of your location, e.g -0.1275
  • zoom:the level of default zoom, e.g 13
  • type:the type of your map, roadmap, satellite, hybrid or terrain
  • width:the width of your map ( in pixels or % total width), default is 100%
  • height:the height of your map ( in pixels or % total height), default is 300px
  • marker:shows an marker at your location, value can be true or false
  • wheel:Enables/disables mousewheel zooming, value can be true or false
  • scale_control:Enables/disables the default scale control, value can be true or false
  • map_type_control:Enables/disables the default map type control, value can be true or false
  • navigation_control:Enables/disables the default navigation control, value can be true or false
  • street_view_control:Enables/disables the default street view control, value can be true or false
    • [/list]

    Examples of google maps created with shortcodes

    [gmap type=ROADMAP lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Hi there. [/gmap] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=ROADMAP lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Hi there. [/gmap] [/code] [/toggle] [gmap type=satellite lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=1] Example of description. Neat, right? :) [/gmap] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=satellite lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=5] Example of description. Neat, right? :) [/gmap] [/code] [/toggle] [gmap type=HYBRID lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=8 map_type_control=false] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=HYBRID lat=40.719681 lng=-74.004593 zoom=8 map_type_control=false] [/code] [/toggle] [gmap type=TERRAIN] [toggle title="Get the code"] [code] [gmap type=TERRAIN] [/code] [/toggle]

item.title: Tour
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tour layout="full"] [tour_page title="Unlimited color options"] [two-fifths]

Unlimited color options

It is really easy to personalize superb to your needs. Selecting the main color is a question of minute or two. Now it is perfectly possible to have a unique featured-filled website for just a couple of dollars! [br] [br] With Superb, you get the possibility to choose from unlimited number of color options. Well actually that is not entirely true. They are limited to 16 000 000. Go on and try them all! It is fun! [/two-fifths] [three-fifths][/three-fifths] [/tour_page] [tour_page title="5 plugins included"] [third][/third] [two-thirds]

5 custom plugins worth $100 included

Superb comes with 5 professional built in plugins, designed and developed by us. These plugins include: [list type="check1"]
  • uBillboard - Second most popular wp plugin at codecanyon (more than 450 sales!) - $20
  • uPricing - Professional pricing table solution for wordpress - $15
  • uAd - Ad management system - $20
  • uShortcodes - plugins that includes many shortcodes with great UI manager and TinyMCE buttons in visual mode.
  • uContact - Contact form plugin
[/list] [/two-thirds] [/tour_page] [tour_page title="Many useful features"]
Function for just about anything
[third] [list type=check1]
  • 5 custom plugins included !
  • 80+ shortcodes
  • Unlimited color options
  • Advanced portfolio
  • Pricing table
[/list] [/third] [third] [list type=check1]
  • Advanced admin interface
  • Pixel-perfect design
  • Unlimited sidebars
  • Many custom widgets
  • Variable number of footer columns
[/list] [/third] [third] [list type=check1]
  • Advanced shortcodes (Charts, maps)
  • Take the tour functionality
  • Built in contact form plugin
  • Easy to setup and personalize
  • Incredibly successful uBillboard included
[/list] [/third] [/tour_page] [tour_page title="Tours Shortcodes"] [half]
Create cool tours like this one in minutes!
Now you can create cool "Take the tour" elements in no time. All you need to do is use the built in tour funcionality, which lets you insert tour to the page of your choice via shortcode. Your tour can be edited in the dialog box, so you basically don't have to touch the code once! [/half] [half]Like everything in this theme, this functionality was designed with the pleasure of the end user in mind. Combine this with many shortcodes, advanced portfolio, Ad management and many other features and you get a complete ready-made solution for your next wordpress project. [/half][/tour_page] [tour_page title="Shortcodes!"] [half]

Tons of shortcodes with UI manager

Superb is super easy to use. To ease your life even more, we prepared a huge set of many shortcodes that will let you insert practically anything into your content. We have shortcodes for just about everything, google maps, google charts, blog posts, typography, layouts, tours etc. [br] [br] Oh and the best part, we also prepared a set of buttons that appear directly in page / post edit screen - so you don't have to insert shortcodes manually. Majority of shortcodes also supports advanced parameters that can be set without touching the code in UI manager that appears upon clicking. This is literally as easy as it gets. [/half] [half] [/half] [/tour_page] [tour_page title="Purchase Superb today!"]
Do not hesitate and purchase Superb today!
[half] If you like what you see, go on and purchase it! Superb offers a really great price / value ration, great design and a lot of great features. You can purchase your copy here. Also, check out our themeforest and codecanyon portfolio. [/half] [half] [box type="success"]It doesn't get much better this, trust us. By purchasing this theme, you are purchasing a product from true wordpress profesional with proven expertise in the field.[/box] [/half] [/tour_page] [/tour]

item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[uds-pricing-table name="pricingtable1"] [br] [third]

uPricing Demo

This is a demo of uPricing, the pricing table module bundled with this theme. If you're looking for a high-level description, you should check out its Feature Page. You can find there a list of features, a high-level description and links to other information.[/third] [third][/third] [third][/third]

item.title: uBillboard
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
uBillboard is a plugin, that we had originally developed for use in our themes, then we've created a Wordpress Plugin from it, but we are continuing to include it with our themes, only now, it is much better. Also, if you for whatever reason decide that you don't want to buy this theme, you can purchase uBillboard here and use it with you current theme very easily.

Main Features

[list type="star4"]
  • Sleek slider front end and admin
  • 18 transition effects + Random
  • Transition effects based on scaling, square and column animation, fading, etc.
  • Paginator, that lets you easily switch among slides
  • Loader that displays real loading progress
  • Customizable resolution
  • Automatic image scaling
  • Great looking and easy to use admin interface
  • Per-slide options like showing time, description layout, transition effect and more
  • Support for HTML markup in descriptions
  • Extensible, add your own filters to the billboard
  • Support for multiple billboards (1 billboard per page)
[/list] And you get all of this ($20 value) for free, when you purchase this theme! [uds-billboard name="innerpage"] You can go visit uBillboard website for more information and, a demo and a screencast (The demo is also on the Home page here).

item.title: uPricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
uPricing is an integral part of Superb. It has been originally developed as a part of Superb, and then we've released it as a separate plugin, similarly to uBillboard. You can get it here as a separate plugin for just $15 and use it with your own theme, or you can get it with this theme completely free! [br]

Description

uPricing is the ultimate and unique solution for all your wordpress related pricing page needs. Creating pricing tables has never been easier! uPricing comes with easy to use jQuery powered admin interface that lets you create and edit your pricing tables (yes, tables, you can have as many as you wish) without having to touch the code once! You also have the ability to select the featured column, that will be highlited in a very stylish way. All of this working in all major browsers. Oh, and did I mention that it comes with five different skins ? It does. And many more schemes will be released in future updates.

Features

[list type="star4"]
  • Great Drag&Drop Admin interface
  • Multiple Color Option
  • Easy to use and embed into your themes
  • Supports all Major Browsers
  • Great documentation
  • Built by a team with years of experience with WordPress
[/list] You can see a demo within Superb here or on the original uPricing page

item.title: uAd
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Similarly to uBillboard and uPricing, uAd has been primarily developed for internal use in our themes, but has become a separate plugin since. You can get uAd as a separate plugin here for a mere $20. With Superb, however you get it for free, plus you don't have to worry about integrating it with your own theme.

Features:

[list type="star4"]
  • Fully integrated advertisement solution
  • Supports all standard banner sizes
  • Supports click counting
  • Supports maximum clicks per banner
  • Supports date restriction
  • Allows you to prioritize banners
  • Integrates with Widgets and Shortcodes into sidebars and content
  • Supported Ad Resolutions
[/list] For more information and for a screencast please visit our uAd page.

item.title: Unlimited color options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: It is really easy to personalize superb to your needs. Selecting the main color is a question of minute or two. Now it is perfectly possible to have a unique featured-filled website for just a couple of dollars! [br] [br] With Superb, you get the possibility to choose from unlimited number of color options. Well actually that is not entirely true. They are limited to 16 000 000. Go on and try them all! It is fun! [br] [br] As you can see, Superb is versatile wordpress theme that can be used for just about anything.[br][br]

item.title: Shortcodes UI manager
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Tons of shortcodes with UI manager

Superb is super easy to use. To ease your life even more, we prepared a huge set of many shortcodes that will let you insert practically anything into your content. We have shortcodes for just about everything, google maps, google charts, blog posts, typography, layouts, tours etc.  Oh and the best part, we also prepared a set of buttons that appear directly in page / post edit screen so you dont have to insert shortcodes manually. Majority of shortcodes also supports advanced parameters that can be set without touching the code in UI manager that appears upon clicking. This is literally as easy as it gets.
[divider]
